title: SusVibes Leaderboard Submission
description: Schema for submitting model results to the SusVibes leaderboard

model_name.description: Name of the model being evaluated

model_organization.description: Organization or company that developed the model

submitting_organization.description: Organization that actually ran the evaluation and submitted the results

submission_date.description: Date of submission in YYYY-MM-DD format

email.description: Contact email for questions about this submission

is_new.description: Whether this model should be highlighted as new on the leaderboard

submission_type.description: Type of submission: 'standard' uses the default SusVibes scaffold (base LLM + standard tools/prompts), 'custom' uses modified scaffolds (multi-model routers, additional tools, custom prompting, etc.). Custom submissions require detailed methodology documentation.

trajectories_available.description: Whether trajectory files are available for this submission

references.description: Links to papers, blog posts, documentation, or other resources about this model

title.description: Title or description of the reference

methodology.description: Information about how the evaluation was conducted

susvibes_version.description: Version of SusVibes used for evaluation

user_simulator.description: Model used for user simulation during evaluation, or null if unknown

agent_framework.description: Agent framework used for evaluation (e.g., 'AutoGPT', 'LangChain', 'Custom', etc.), or null if unknown

notes.description: Additional notes about the evaluation methodology

modified_prompts.description: Whether any modifications were made to user simulator or agent prompts

omitted_questions.description: Whether any questions/tasks were omitted from the evaluation

cost.description: Average cost in USD to run one trajectory in this domain (optional)
